verses.name: 1 Corinthians 6:5
verses.text: I speak to your shame. Is it so, that there is not a wise man among you? no, not one that shall be able to judge between his brethren?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 6:6
verses.text: But brother goeth to law with brother, and that before the unbelievers.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 6:7
verses.text: Now therefore there is utterly a fault among you, because ye go to law one with another. Why do ye not rather take wrong? why do ye not rather suffer yourselves to be defrauded?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 6:8
verses.text: Nay, ye do wrong, and defraud, and that your brethren.
